name: moneydevkit-nextjs-workspace
description: Workspace for Money Dev Kit web packages.

scripts.typecheck: pnpm run build && pnpm -r run --if-present typecheck
scripts.test:e2e: concurrently -k -s first "pnpm --filter mdk-nextjs-demo run dev -- --hostname 0.0.0.0 --port 3010" "wait-on http://localhost:3010 && CYPRESS_BASE_URL=http://localhost:3010 cypress run --spec cypress/e2e/checkout.cy.ts"
